ygData.subject: Re: befallen fun
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/23/99 12:21:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Yes.  I am a Dark Elf Necro, who has been living in the freeport area for a while (West
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/23/99 12:21:13 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
bwgogol@... writes:

> I've also been told not to go to North Freeport, because you will be
> KOS. The guards are all paladins... Don't know if it's true or not,
> never been there. But the question still remains from the original
> post: Where is the necro guild in Freeport, if there is one?

Yes. I am a Dark Elf Necro, who has been living in the freeport area for a
while (West commons, East Commons, North Ro, Freeport)... and I can tell you,
the paladin guards in North Freeport will Attack you on sight. And guess
where the bank is? So no banking while there. Maybe you can make a trip to
nectulos to bank (it is off the East commonlands) but then.... the guards
there tend to kill humans, so I would check first (you may be excused being a
necro) The bank there is in the Neriak Commons.

And a previous post mentioned the necro guild being in east freeport in an
ruined building.

Sonoroud
